ygData.subject: RE: Grand Opening!
ygData.msgSnippet: WTG Rokenn!! Nicely done!  Only a couple things to mention... 1. Put the location to buy song as a key on the main list eg: Q,K or E or HK.  I keep a chart
ygData.messageBody:
WTG Rokenn!!

Nicely done! Only a couple things to mention...

1. Put the location to buy song as a key on the main list eg: Q,K or E or
HK. I keep a chart like the main one handy for the frequent tells:

yungbard: excuse me m'lady can you tell me where to buy my 14th song?

sylly: sure but first just call me sylly!

looks on handy dandy chart

sylly: ahh yes you can get Lyssa's Libbertto in Erudin - look for the round
building kinda in center of town or ask someone to take you to the library -
there is no name on the building

feels like she impressed someone

yungbard: ahh thank you m'lady

2. It's prolly just me but I dont care for dark backgrounds. Ok, that one
doesn't count. It printed quite well for a web page - did you do something
special to make page break correctly? If you have page controls for
printing, I would suggest having fewer songs on the first page and making
the abbreviation key a "footer" so it repeats on both pages. I keep my
sheet in a plastic cover right next to my keyboard and refer to it alot.
Having the key on both sides would be handy.

All in all - it looks really great!

Thanks a bunch Rokenn!!! (and John too as i imagine this is part of your
joint effort? or is his ananysis coming later?)

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 10, 1999 10:56 AM
To: EQBards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Grand Opening!


From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

I have taken the feedback from this list and the Concert Hall message board
and put together a website with your collected wisdom. Check it out and let
me know what you think :)

http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/index.html

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
